text: Ashley Alton "Ash" McGregor (born 3 September 1953) is a former New Zealand rugby union player. A loose forward, McGregor represented Southland and, briefly, Otago at a provincial level. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, on their 1978 tour of Britain and Ireland, playing three matches but no internationals. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gore, New Zealand Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:New Zealand international rugby union players Category:Southland Stags players Category:Otago rugby union players Category:Rugby union number eights Category:Rugby union flankers
title: Ash McGregor
